command_not_found.title: ❌ Command Not Found
command_not_found.description: That command doesn't exist. Use `l.help` to see available commands.

command_disabled.title: 🚫 Command Disabled
command_disabled.description: This command has been disabled for this server.

missing_permissions.title: 🔒 Missing Permissions
missing_permissions.description: You don't have permission to use this command.

bot_missing_permissions.title: 🤖 Bot Missing Permissions
bot_missing_permissions.description: I don't have the required permissions to execute this command.

settings_not_admin.title: 🔒 Admin Only
settings_not_admin.description: Only administrators can change bot settings.

settings_more_args.title: ℹ️ Settings Help
settings_more_args.description: Use `l.settings` to view all settings, `l.settings <option>` to view a specific setting, or `l.settings <option> <value>` to change a setting.
